description: Right on McCarren Park, my sunny, beautifully furnished studio apartment is right in the heart of all that Williamburg has to offer— Cafe Mogador Williamsburg, Hotel Delmano, Wythe Hotel, Music Hall of Williamsburg, Smorgasburg. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Charming, Sunny Studio in Williamsburg
review: Very cozy, bright and sunny studio. Ariella left the keys for us at the doorman so it was very easy to get in. The subway is just a 5 minutes walk. The street has many nice cafes, restaurants, shops. There is a big park right ext to the building ideal for running. We had a great experience!
